name: Sumdate
tagline: Jquery plugin used to sum dates
body:
###Welcome The plugin sumdate is a utilitare for dates manipulations. Converting date type for String to Date or Date to String. ###Required jQuery 1.6.0 or more Include plugin ``` ``` Use direct mode, pass date value in a parameter "date" Ex: ``` var date =new Date(); date.setMonth(1); // February date.setDate(27); var newDate = $.sumdate({methods:['sum'],"date":date,"sumValues":{"days":5}}); alert(newDate); // Mon Mar 04 2013 15:38:28 GMT-0300 (Hora oficial do Brasil) ``` Use selector mode, pass the HTML element that contains a date value Ex: ```
20/12/2013
``` ###Author [Luciano Mendes Prado](mailto:lucianomendesprado@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
